title: coinfunda

content: I am looking for a hardware wallet to store and stake my CI20 toekns and ICP coins also. Few article about ICP wallet mentioning some wallet but no info on hardware wallet. Which is the best one in your opinion? or if you are using?

Which is the best one in your opinion? or if you are using?I don't know about CI20 tokens, but i can share some information about ICP.You can store over 5000 different crypto on ledger hardware wallets. for more information and to learn more about these wallets read this article where they compared many wallets click on anyone, and you can read more information about specific wallets. contact there support for more information, don't buy wallet first without getting all the information required.
